transArray.content: The room is clean and hygienic. The layout is reasonable, the lighting is good, and the rooms are disinfected, so you can stay at ease! The breakfast was also delicious, very satisfying! The location of the hotel is also good, very close to the examination school

Hello, dear guests, the cat is rolling in the fallen leaves, the sunset is filling the sky, the wind is blowing my longing for you to the world that my little man loves, itâ€™s just you, my little man who loves you.
